20/10/22, 12:29â€¯am - Umyal Dixit: Feelings? 
Fuck them 
This is the first time me swearing a word but yk its just so damn hard
Its funny how there is a moment in your life when you get close to someone. So close that you think you can trust that person and lean on whenever you feel insecure. But then theres this moment, that instant when the person in front of you just amuses you. Saying certain things you didnt wanted to hear from them cause it was better off when that was not said, it was better off when you feel mutually and never said cause when that person gets the courage and have the guts to say what actually is the truth, u get a rush of a million thoughts, thoughts that are good,bad,happy,sad and soo many other things. You get confused and messed up in the  entangled threads of your own feelings. And this messed up mind of yours says things out loud which wernt meant to be said. You meant the total opposite but you were scared. Scared of some other certain people whose trust you might broke if you confess what the truth is. Getting confused in this whole mess, you end up saying wrong things, which ends up breaking friendships or maybe having the awkwardness that you didnt wanted. That exact awkwardness that you were scared of in the beginning which was making you supress your feelings. And now its all into pieces, you scared at every step that its gonna just fall off, you trying everything to mend what you had but the other person keeps breaking it off and you just feel shitty again. That exact feeling that you had before you met that person. Having trust issues, starting to feel as a bad person, making yourself believe that you are the one who is not worthy of anything. Thats why feelings are best if kept hidden until you are sure that whatever is coming is gonna be good. Rn after all this, u might wanna be normal with that person, have the same thing you had a few days ago but its not gonna be same. You are gonna regret every part of your convo with that person after the moment you ghosted them cause you were scared. But at the end we all have regrets until the light goes off and the show is over.
